name: github-auto-load-more
description: Chrome extension to automatically expand all 'Load more' buttons in GitHub PR reviews

scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ && [ -f popup.html ] && cp popup.html dist/ || echo 'No popup.html to copy'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch

author: hashiiiii
